products.Title: MacBook Pro
products.Description: Blazing-fast performance with M-series chips, stunning Liquid Retina display options, and up to 22 hours of battery life.

products.Title: MacBook Air
products.Description: Silent, fanless design with all-day battery life — perfect for portable productivity and creativity.

products.Title: iMac
products.Description: A breathtaking 4.5K Retina display, superfast performance, and striking colors — all in one.
